meals.name: Herb-Crusted Rack of Lamb
meals.description: Succulent lamb rack with rosemary crust, served with truffle mashed potatoes.

meals.name: Filet Mignon
meals.description: Prime filet mignon with a peppercorn crust and cognac cream sauce.

meals.description: Flaky sea bass with lemon-butter sauce, served with seasonal vegetables.
